docs.snippet: In a story Jan. 6 about a wrong-way crash that killed five teens, The Associated Press erroneously attributed information about what is in a toxicology report. That information previously was reported by Vermont News First; it did not come from po...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Jan. 6 about a wrong-way crash that killed five teens, The Associated Press erroneously attributed information about what is in a toxicology report. That information previously was reported by Vermont News First; it did not come from police.
